text: Christopher Strong is a romance novel by the British writer Gilbert Frankau which was first published in 1932. ==Film adaptation== In 1933 the novel was adapted into an American film Christopher Strong made by RKO Pictures and starring Katharine Hepburn and Colin Clive.Goble p.166 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. Category:1932 British novels Category:Novels set in England Category:British novels adapted into films Category:Novels by Gilbert Frankau
title: Christopher Strong (novel)
